title: Platform Foundation
description: Base backend setup, CI, shared middleware, and observability baseline.
acceptance_criteria: CI passes; request IDs in logs; service health endpoint available

title: Assistant Core Flow
description: Interpret + confirm flow for safe assistant actions.
acceptance_criteria: Interpret and confirm endpoints function with deterministic response schema

title: Task Management Core
description: Task create/read/update/delete with reminders and audit.
acceptance_criteria: Task lifecycle APIs pass acceptance tests; reminders and audits are present

title: Calendar Provider 1
description: Provider 1 OAuth and event mutation flow.
acceptance_criteria: Provider 1 connect + event CRUD stable in staging

title: Ops and Release Readiness
description: SLOs, alerts, runbooks, release checks.
acceptance_criteria: Alerting and runbook validated; release checklist complete

title: Initialize backend repo and CI pipeline
description: Create service repo/module layout, lint/test pipeline, and build job.
acceptance_criteria: Main branch build green; lint/test jobs configured

title: Implement auth middleware
description: Add bearer token validation and user context propagation.
acceptance_criteria: Unauthorized requests rejected; user ID available in handlers

title: Add request correlation IDs and structured logging
description: Inject request ID in middleware and include in all logs.
acceptance_criteria: All API logs include request_id and endpoint

title: Create Task and ActionAudit DB migrations
description: Add initial Task and ActionAudit tables with required indexes.
acceptance_criteria: Migrations run cleanly; indexes present for key query paths

title: Build POST /v1/assistant/interpret
description: Implement minimal intent parse and entity extraction response contract.
acceptance_criteria: Endpoint returns intent/entities/confirmation requirement

title: Build POST /v1/assistant/confirm
description: Implement confirmation decision endpoint and execution trigger.
acceptance_criteria: Confirm executes action; cancel performs no mutation

title: Build POST /v1/tasks with idempotency
description: Create task endpoint with idempotency key support.
acceptance_criteria: Duplicate idempotency key does not create duplicate task

title: Write ActionAudit hook for task create
description: Persist success/failure audit for confirmed task actions.
acceptance_criteria: Audit row created on success and failure paths

title: Reminder queue producer for task create
description: Publish reminder job event after task creation.
acceptance_criteria: Reminder job enqueued with due/reminder timestamps

title: Mobile shell: voice/text capture + confirm UI
description: Implement basic mobile capture and confirmation interaction.
acceptance_criteria: User can submit utterance and confirm/cancel action

title: Build GET /v1/tasks list endpoint
description: Return tasks with filters (status, due range, pagination).
acceptance_criteria: Filtered task list returned with stable pagination

title: Build PATCH /v1/tasks/{id}
description: Update task fields: title/status/priority/due/reminder/tags.
acceptance_criteria: Allowed fields update correctly and are audited

title: Build DELETE /v1/tasks/{id}
description: Soft-delete or cancel task with audit trail.
acceptance_criteria: Task removed from active list and audit event recorded

title: Implement provider 1 OAuth connect flow
description: Start/callback/disconnect flow for calendar provider 1.
acceptance_criteria: User can connect and disconnect provider successfully

title: Build POST /v1/events for provider 1
description: Create calendar event with confirmation path.
acceptance_criteria: Event created in provider and stored locally

title: Build PATCH /v1/events/{id} for provider 1
description: Update/move calendar event with concurrency checks.
acceptance_criteria: Event updates succeed; conflict errors handled

title: Build DELETE /v1/events/{id} for provider 1
description: Cancel/delete event mapping to provider behavior.
acceptance_criteria: Event cancellation reflected locally and remotely

title: Queue worker retry/backoff and dead-letter baseline
description: Add retry policy and dead-letter queue behavior for provider operations.
acceptance_criteria: Transient errors retry with backoff; permanent failures dead-letter

title: Reminder worker delivery status tracking
description: Execute reminder jobs and track delivered/failed state.
acceptance_criteria: Reminder status persisted for monitoring

title: Build GET /v1/planning/day
description: Return daily plan combining tasks + events.
acceptance_criteria: Daily plan ordered by time/priority with clear summary

title: Build GET /v1/history/actions
description: Return action history timeline with filters.
acceptance_criteria: History endpoint returns assistant/user action timeline

title: Integrate token vault and secret handling
description: Move provider tokens to vault and enforce access policies.
acceptance_criteria: No provider token stored plaintext in app DB

title: Implement log redaction and retention settings
description: Apply redaction rules and retention policy configs.
acceptance_criteria: Sensitive fields redacted; retention config active

title: SLO dashboards and alert rules
description: Create latency/error/success/queue-depth dashboards and alert thresholds.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboards live; alerts fire correctly in test

title: On-call runbook and incident response checklist
description: Document top failure scenarios and mitigation steps.
acceptance_criteria: Runbook reviewed and used in tabletop exercise

title: End-to-end staging test and go/no-go review
description: Execute P0 acceptance tests and release decision meeting.
acceptance_criteria: P0 tests pass; no open critical defects; release decision logged
